import React,{Component} from "react" import logo from "../logo.png" import iphone from "../image/iphone.png" import { BiLockAlt,BiDollar,BiRocket } from "react-icons/bi"; import { BsFillPeopleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; import { FiInstagram,FiTwitter,FiFacebook } from "react-icons/fi"; import { HiBadgeCheck,HiSpeakerphone } from "react-icons/hi"; import Roll from 'react-reveal/Roll'; import { BsClock ,BsPieChartFill,BsGraphUp,BsFillLockFill} from "react-icons/bs"; import { VscMail } from "react-icons/vsc"; import { GrLineChart } from "react-icons/gr"; import { RiBankLine } from "react-icons/ri"; class About extends Component{ render(){ return(
What do we got here?

Profile Boost

The more active you get on the platform, the more you will be seen by others.

Real Time

As soon as you enter the Platforms in a couple of clicks, you are connected to the people, activities, and programs that you are more interested in.

Earn Income

Enjoy what you love do the most, and make money at the same time by selling your program

Market your Brand

Made it easy in couple steps to show your brand to the world

Fit Check

Show your obstacles, show how you achieved them with the help of your community around you, to receive a Fit check

Messaging

Connected with people and create your own community

Optimization

We connect you directly with a community to provide all the help needed, which will boost your profile

Profile Growth

Focus on yourself, leave the rest to us and your community. More achievements, means more engagement.

Security

Join our encrypted and secure platform
) } } export default About;
